The volume of a sphere can be found with the equation V, equals, start fraction, 4, divided by, 3, end fraction, pi, r, cubedV=43πr3V=\frac{4}{3}\pi r^3V=34​πr3 and the surface area can be found with S, equals, 4, pi, r, squared, .S=4πr2.S=4\pi r^2.S=4πr2. Round your answer to three decimal places (if necessary).
